title.narrative: Tanzania Education and Skills for Productive Jobs Program (ESPJ)

description.narrative: The Program Development Objective is to strengthen the institutional capacity of the Recipient's skills development system and to promote the expansion and quality of labor market driven skills development opportunities in select economic sectors.

participating-org.narrative: Ministry of Education, Science and Technology

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I, E. 1. Program Operational Manual | Description :Program Operational Manual in place 4months after Effective Date | Due Date :
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section III, A. 1. Program Reports | Description :Annual Program Implementation Report prepared atthe end of fiscal year | Due Date :
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section III, A. 2. Program Reports | Description :Prepare and submit a Mid-Term Report | Due Date :
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section III, B. 1. Program Financial Audits | Description :Submission of Annual Audited FinancialStatement | Due Date :

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section III, B. 2. Program Financial Audits | Description :Program Institutions produce quarterlyinternal audit reports and audit report committees meet quarterly | Due Date :
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section III, C. (a) Procurement Audit and Value for Money Audit | Description :Submission ofProcurement Audit every two years | Due Date :
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section III, C. (b) Procurement Audit and Value for Money Audit | Description :Submission of Valuefor Money audit every two years | Due Date :
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section III, D. Annual Performance Assessment | Description :Submission of Annual PerformanceAssessment | Due Date :
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section V, Other Undertakings | Description :Revise chart of accounts for MoESTVT to includeTargeted Sectors | Due Date :
